content: Per the title, is there a way to get Lean to print the typeclass resolution path for a particular instance? I'm sure there's some incantation involving elab that does the job but I'm still ignorant about metaprogramming.
What exactly do you mean for this?
You can use set_option trace.Meta.synthInstance true to make Lean display the instance search it went through to solve a type-class problem, this might be what you're looking for.
That was precisely what I meant, thank you! Sorry if it was unclear
Luigi Massacci has marked this topic as resolved.
